a <- cov(challenger$temperature, challenger$distress_ct)/var(challenger$temperature)
b <- mean(challenger$distress_ct)-(a*mean(challenger$temperature))

# a (ê¸°ìš¸ê¸°) = -0.057
# b (ì ˆí¸) = 4.3
